CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests $x for iterator and non-iterator types.

$x('42')
42
$x('name(/html)')
"html"
$x('not(42)')
false
$x('/html/body/p').length
1
$x('//a/@href')[0]
href="http://chromium.org"
$x('./a/@href', document.body)[0]
href="http://chromium.org"
$x('./a@href', document.body)
VM:1 Uncaught DOMException: Failed to execute '$x' on 'CommandLineAPI': The string './a@href' is not a valid XPath expression.
    at <anonymous>:1:1
(anonymous) @ VM:1
console-xpath.js:25 complete
